articles.description: This week, explore the technology that could allow humans to live on Mars, uncover the truth of a Neanderthal flower burial, see a leggy birdlike dinosaur, and more.

articles.title: Asteroid 2023 RL approaching Earth at 19376 kmph, NASA says; check key details - HT Tech
articles.description: While smaller asteroids tend to pass Earth nearly every day, NASA has issued an alert against a bus-sized asteroid that will come very close to the planet soon.
articles.content: Asteroids are a constantly looming threat to the Earth. NASA actively monitors asteroids to safeguard the planet from potential threats. Their telescopes track newly discovered Near-Earth Asteroids (… [+1882 chars]

articles.title: Black Hole Snack Attack: NASA's Swift Spies Sun-Like Star Being Consumed Bite by Bite - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists, using NASA’s Neil Gehrels Swift Observatory, have identified a black hole in a distant galaxy that appears to be recurrently consuming parts of a Sun-like star. This groundbreaking discovery was made possible by a new method of analyzing data from…
articles.content:
ByJeanette Kazmierczak, NASAs Goddard Space Flight CenterSeptember 9, 2023
